name: auth-error-001
solution: Users unable to login due to JWT token expiration not being handled correctly
action: Added token refresh logic with exponential backoff retry mechanism
created-at: Updated auth.ts middleware and added refresh endpoint

name: db-investigation-002
solution: Application crashes during high traffic due to database connection pool being exhausted
action: Increased pool size from 10 to 50 and added connection timeout handling

name: dark-mode-003
solution: Users requested dark mode for better viewing experience at night
action: Implemented theme toggle using CSS variables and localStorage for persistence
created-at: Created theme.ts utility and updated global.css with dark mode variables

name: memory-leak-004
solution: Server memory usage grows continuously when WebSocket connections are active
action: Fixed event listener cleanup in disconnect handler to prevent memory leaks

name: image-optimization-005
solution: Page load time is slow due to large unoptimized images
action: Implemented lazy loading and WebP format with fallback to JPEG
created-at: Added next/image component and configured image optimization in next.config.js

name: typescript-migration-006
solution: Codebase was in JavaScript making it hard to catch type errors
action: Migrated entire codebase to TypeScript with strict mode enabled
created-at: Converted all .js files to .ts, added type definitions, configured tsconfig.json

name: f2af0e5b-17f7-4839-8ed7-783f20018294
tags: Update tests, CSV output, and publish v0.1.7
solution: Need full test coverage and token-optimized CSV output for LLMs
action: Implemented comprehensive unit tests, Minimal CSV export, and default CSV output for LLM mode. Published v0.1.7.
created-at: Added tests with 99%+ coverage, implemented logEntriesToCSVMinimal, updated visualizer for CSV output, and updated documentations.

name: Improve release workflow with CHANGELOG.md integration
problem: Release workflow only used git commit messages for changelog
solution: Enhanced .github/workflows/release.yml to parse CHANGELOG.md for version-specific content, updated docs/release.md with new process, and fixed package dependencies

name: Improve release workflow with CHANGELOG.md integration
problem: Release workflow only used git commit messages for changelog
solution: Enhanced .github/workflows/release.yml to parse CHANGELOG.md for version-specific content, updated docs/release.md with new process, and fixed package dependencies

name: Add GitHub CLI workflow trigger support
problem: Release workflow could only be triggered by git tag pushes
solution: Added workflow_dispatch trigger with version input and optional tag creation
action: Updated .github/workflows/release.yml to support manual triggering via gh command
